model

Class Ref_MonthlyDues

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Ref_MonthlyDues

  • public class Ref_MonthlyDues
extends java.lang.Object
    Ref_MonthlyDues Object A Ref_MonthlyDues object contains the monthly dues allocated for all the homeowners within a specified time period.
    Since:
    2017-10-28

      • getNumberOfMonths

        public int getNumberOfMonths()
        Gets the number of months between the startMonth and endMonth. It is considered one (1) month if both are equal.
        Returns:
